Hi!

My name is Diego Sieg. I'm a hacker journalist passionate about data, metrics, infographics, maps, journalism, design, Internet, and to create / to develop innovative things. I love challenges and for that reason I'm always trying to solve problems. I believe that the use of technology + innovation processes + passion + creativity can transform our lives and the place where we live. Ideas are bubbling in my head all the time. Let's build a better world together?

About me

Web Developer, Journalist, Digital Strategist, Business Innovator (BMG Canvas & Lean Startup), Agile lover, Tech Entreprenur, Digital Content Developer & Producer, Academic Researcher of Data Driven Journalism, Apple & Google fan, Internet addict, Innovation Enthusiast, Geek, Curious, Thinker, Open mind, Friendly, Books & Magazines & Movies & Music fan, Chef & Barista at home, Proactive, Creative, Brazilian, Quick learning person, Crazy about new challenges, Backpacker… Everytime, I'm building, measuring and learning in a continuous cycle.

At the moment I'm studying Ruby on Rails, Html5, Css3, JavaScript, d3.js, Data scraping, Data analytics, Business Model Generation, Lean Startup, and Design Thinking. I've been doing cool things in a small/happy software house company, called Designa. Beside that, I've been working on my own project: http://minhacidade.me.

main skills

Html5, CSS 3, JavaScript, Rails, Data-driven Journalism, Digital Media, Data Visualization, Charts & Infographics, BizDev, Design Thinking, Social Media, Design, Agile, Lean, Startup Environment, Multimedia Content.

Research

I'm always eagerly looking gain new knowledge. Nowadays, I'm a member of the research team of TECCCOG (Technology, Communication and Cognition), from Universidade Metodista de São Paulo, mentored by Prof. Dr. Walter Teixeira Lima Junior.

  • :: Journalism in the age of smart semantic web - big data
  • :: Cyber Rebels - a new look at the communication theory
  • :: Hacker Journalist - a new challenge on journalist profile
